ClassDesc: Sampler object that defines how Allocations can be read as textures within a kernel. Samplers are used in conjunction with the rsSample runtime function to return values from normalized coordinates. Any Allocation used with a Sampler must have been created with @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Allocation#USAGE_GRAPHICS_TEXTURE_E@; using a Sampler on an @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Allocation_E@ that was not created with @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Allocation#USAGE_GRAPHICS_TEXTURE_E@ is undefined.
